      '\n' +
      '**KYC requirements**: For donations above £5,000 (approximately $6,500), the British Red Cross requires donors to provide their name and donation amount via email at [donatecrypto@redcross.org.uk](mailto:donatecrypto@redcross.org.uk) for ethical screening and due diligence checks.
